title-description: Hello, I am Entertainment_YH, also known as 'Yule_YH' or 'YH'. This website is YH's personal website, used for more people to learn about me, share about me, and interact with me. Welcome to my website!
about-web-text: This website was created on March 30, 2025, and I hope it can become an interesting place to record the bits and pieces of my life, as well as to let more people understand the basic information about me. At the same time, I welcome everyone's feedback, and I will continue to update the website content to make it better and better. Welcome everyone to visit!
web-history-text: As mentioned above, this website was created on March 30, 2025, but it is not Entertainment_YH's first website! The author first learned HTML in 2024, when he needed to prepare for the high school entrance examination, so the initial learning of the website was not much. As of now (March 31, 2025), the author is in the first year of high school, and the update speed may be relatively slow, but the author promises that as time goes by, the website content will become richer and richer. (Of course, if you want to see the original website, it is temporarily lying in the previous project, and it may be publicly exhibited in the future (as a negative teaching material), but for now, it is considered a废稿. The reason is that the author has been trying new codes and functions continuously, but has not seriously studied the underlying basic code, resulting in the website being neither beautiful nor having many bugs, so there is now this version.)
other-info: Of course, clicking on the small software icons on the website can also directly jump to the corresponding homepage.
announcement002-text: I have added a dynamic function to my website, you can view some information about this website in real-time at the bottom of the website. Of course, if my technical strength is sufficient, I will add an online dynamic function, that is, let visitors also publish dynamics.
announcement001-text-1: Continue to develop new features or modules
post002-text: Imagine this: you have a remote control that can reset anything, it can reset anything, whether it objectively exists or not. For example, resetting a relationship with someone, and after the reset, it's like a stranger; or a broken glass cup, and after the reset, it returns to the timeline before it was broken. What would you use this remote control for? (Can only be reset once, invalid after one use)
post001-text: This is my first dynamic, and also the test dynamic of the website. This column will put some interesting things in the future, similar to 'QQ Space' or 'WeChat Moments', and will also reprint some interesting things. Please look forward to it!
voident-game-product1: "Minecraft Bedrock Edition" server IP address: mc.voident.xyz:19132
voident-game-product2: The studio's "Minecraft China Edition" server will be launched at the end of 2025.
translation-description: All translations are machine translations and may be incorrect. Please refer to the original text in Simplified Chinese.
laifu-description: This is a small dog raised by the author of this website from 2021 to 2022. It is a silver fox, and was forced to be given away due to disturbing the peace. The author is very reluctant to part with it. Therefore, this is a memorial to Lai Fu.
xianmi-description: A beautiful snow-capped mountain located in Xianmi National Forest Park, Qilian Mountains. I was fortunate to visit it twice in 2023, and to be honest, it shocked me. At an altitude of 3,400 meters, it stands here, symbolizing the majestic grandeur of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.
xianmi-location: Xianmi National Forest Park, Gansu Province, China
taklamakan-description: Located in the depths of Asia, in front of the towering stele, looking far into the distance, the Taklamakan Desert comes to you in its most primitive form. The vast sea of sand meets the sky in the distance, with solitary smoke and sunset complementing each other. The sand dunes are like solidified waves, and every ripple is engraved with thousands of years of wind and rain, while the withered Hu Yang narrates the rise and fall of the Loulan ancient country. ————Fallen Star (Text provided by website contributor)
taklamakan-location: Aksu City, Aral City, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China
thunder-description: Accidentally (not accidentally) captured lightning, but some people say I edited the photo??
yh-description: The author of this website, there's nothing much to write, right?
